name: The origin II (Black Edition)
description: Let's focus now on the middle of the work, I modeled two hands that are coming closer, one being the man's hand in height that comes to get the woman's. I wanted to represent here the current inequality between genders, but also the hope and the fact that Man must associate to move forward into the future. The flash of light in the center symbolizes the action that everyone must do to move forward to achieve a renewal. (2000x2000 pixels / 7.09Mo)
